titleInfo.title: Aerial View of Christian Brothers Campus and Midtown Memphis

mods.abstract: This aerial view of Christian Brothers College campus looked south and west to a tree-covered expanse of midtown Memphis. Visible campus buildings were (from Left): the Theater, the Engineering labs (Benilde), the Gymasium, the Fort (Battersby), St. Joseph, Ave Maria, the Administration Buillding (Barry), the High School Building (Kenrick), the Bell Tower, Maurelian, and the auxiliary buildings.
